Mayor Albio Sires
=================

![](https://www.westnewyorknj.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/Albio-Sires.jpg)

Mayor Albio Sires
-----------------

**Mayor Albio Sires is the Director of Public Safety**

#### Mayor

* Albio Sires
* 201-295-5100
